Why Python is right for Abjad¶

Abjad is an interactive software system designed to help composers build up complex pieces of music notation in an iterative and incremental way. Straightforward procedural syntax, the availability of basic functional constructs, and the interactive interpreter make Python the natural choice for Abjad.
